org.sql: SELECT spree_products_taxons.* FROM spree_products_taxons WHERE spree_products_taxons.product_id = "$1" AND spree_products_taxons.taxon_id = "$2"

rewrites.sql: SELECT spree_products_taxons.* FROM spree_products_taxons WHERE spree_products_taxons.product_id = "$1" AND spree_products_taxons.taxon_id = "$2" LIMIT 1
